ERROR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid username or password. You need to use master, active, posting or memo key to log in.
TOOLTIP_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY: This is a custom password you've set to unlock your account for usage. This is not your Steem private key. If you forgot your keychain password you can import your account again.
TOOLTIP_IMPORT_ENCRYPTION_KEY: This is a new custom password you can create to protect your account. This is not your Steem private key.
